results.title: 1BR Apartment Available for MidTerm Stays | by Stay Redamo

publicDescription.summary: This cozy 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment hosted by leading vacation rental company Stay Redamo is the perfect spot for your stay! Comfy queen bed, spacious living space and stocked kitchen will make you feel right at home!
publicDescription.space: The space features 1 bedroom complete with a queen bed, 1 bathroom with a bathtub shower combo, and a kitchen complete with a refrigerator, stove, oven, and dishwasher!
publicDescription.neighborhood: Located just 2 blocks of St. Charles Ave, this apartment is in the most convenient location to get anywhere in the city!
publicDescription.transit: Walk 2 blocks to the streetcar line and take it into the French Quarter or through the Garden District! Uber anywhere in the city within 5-10 minutes!

publicDescription.summary: This transformed vibrant multi-unit development in the revitalized Central City & Warehouse Arts District is central to everywhere! The Central Business District to the east,  and the Garden District to the south. Walk to the streetcar line and the Convention Center. This neighborhood is rich in culture, history, music and is often overlooked. Sleek modern design with all the amenities, and concierge services. Sleek modern design managed by a 5 star Property Management Company Redamo.
publicDescription.space:
Newly Renovated 2BR/1BA professionally designed and managed by your experienced local management team at Redamo. 

Gated community with a keyless gate & door code entry

This single unit comes with 2 King beds and 1 Queen pull out sofa bed


Kitchen has: 
Kettle
Toaster
Microwave
Stove/oven range
Dish towels
Emergency kit & fire extinguisher 

Stackable laundry unit. 

Bathroom stocked with towles. 

Bedrooms come with extra pillows
Large closets.

Staff on call to assist with any questions or local recommendations.


**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access:
Gated Community 
Keyless door code entry
publicDescription.transit: Walking distance to the world famous St. Charles Streetcar Line. Ferry across the Mississippi to Algiers point, another unique historical neighborhood. Uber or Lyft anywhere in 5-10 minutes.
publicDescription.notes: If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

1627 Baronne access info/instructions:

Press 8459 to unlock 
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the üîêbutton

Alarm code - 8459

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network  Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us, please contact Solution Inc. directly at 1-844-640-5860. They are available 24 hours a day. *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black.  You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursdays from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

The AC temperature controls are locked and set to not go below 68 or above 75, as to not risk it breaking during your stay. Tampering with the system may result in a fine. 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3 
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening


Outdoor Space -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt. No loud noise outside after 10pm.

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside for your use.

Laundry -
Fire extinguisher 
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Broom, mop and cleaning supplies
Detergent

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

confirmedBeforeCheckIn.message:
Hello, 
We are currently handling all COVID-19 related trip issues from March 14th -April 16th. We are a small business that has been forced to work at minimal operating levels. Due to the recent overload of guest messages, and phone calls our response time will be delayed. We are giving our staff members a day to catch up and tend to their families. We will be right back with you to answer any questions you may have regarding your future trip with us.

publicDescription.houseRules:
‚Ä¢ No smoking
‚Ä¢ No pets
‚Ä¢ No parties or events
‚Ä¢ Check-in is anytime after 4PM
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

This newly constructed beauty has all the amenities you could possibly need during your stay!  Great outdoor space to entertain your guests and only 2 blocks off  of St. Charles Ave, right on the parade route! Make this spacious home your Mardi Gras headquarters!
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are here to help in any way. Please let us know if you need anything. Otherwise, we leave guests alone to enjoy the home and our amazing city!
publicDescription.transit: The home is located 2 blocks from the St. Charles Streetcar line, which can take you through the Garden District and into Uptown, or down into Downtown and the French Quarter. It costs $1.25 for 1 ride, $3 for a day pass, and $9 for a 3 day pass. You're only 5 minutes away from the Superdome, 5 minutes away from the French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, 5 minutes away from the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and 10 minutes away from City Park to attend the Voodoo Festival! We alway recommend using Uber and Lyft while getting around the city at night time.
publicDescription.neighborhood:
The home is located in the Lower Garden District! Stately neoclassical mansions, cool cafes, eclectic eateries and homey pubs line oak-shaded streets in the charming Lower Garden District. Handmade jewelry, local antiques and vintage Mardi Gras costumes are on sale at the monthly Little Flea NOLA market, while a stretch of Magazine Street has antiques shops and clothing boutiques. Tiny parks like Annunciation Square and Coliseum Square are local gathering spots.

Restaurants we recommend in the area: 
Gris-Gris 
Lula 
Meril
publicDescription.space:
Our brand new home has 3 floors and 5 bedrooms - 1 King, 3 Queens and a bunk space! We have 2 sets of bunk beds - 1 twin over twin with twin trundle and 1 twin over twin regular bunk, 2 twin air beds and a queen sofa bed in the living room, 3 full baths and a kitchen completely stocked with all kinds of small extras. This is the place to be! 

2,250 square feet!

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, ironing board and steamer/iron combo), SmartTV, wifi and central AC.

We have a brand new pack-n-play, baby bath, baby bath tub, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 

19STR-03378

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: You have access to the entire home, including our outdoor space!
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

Highly recommend Ashton with Jet Set Bachelorette. 
Ask about our gift baskets & luxury robes. Must order 60 days in advanced.

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are here to help in any way. Please let us know if you need anything. Otherwise, we leave guests alone to enjoy the home and our amazing city!
publicDescription.neighborhood:
The home is located in the Lower Garden District! Stately neoclassical mansions, cool cafes, eclectic eateries and homey pubs line oak-shaded streets in the charming Lower Garden District. Handmade jewelry, local antiques and vintage Mardi Gras costumes are on sale at the monthly Little Flea NOLA market, while a stretch of Magazine Street has antiques shops and clothing boutiques. Tiny parks like Annunciation Square and Coliseum Square are local gathering spots.

Restaurants we recommend in the area: 
Gris-Gris 
Lula 
Meril
publicDescription.space:
Our brand new home has 3 floors and 5 bedrooms - 1 King, 3 Queens and a bunk space! We have 2 sets of bunk beds - 1 twin over twin with twin trundle and 1 twin over twin regular bunk, 2 twin air beds and a queen sofa bed in the living room, 3 full baths and a kitchen completely stocked with all kinds of small extras. This is the place to be! 

2,250 square feet! 

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, ironing board and steamer/iron combo), SmartTV, wifi and central AC.

We have a brand new pac-n-play, baby bath, baby bath tub, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 

19STR-03378

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

This newly constructed beauty has all the amenities you could possibly need during your stay!  Great outdoor space to entertain your guests and only 2 blocks off of St. Charles Ave, right on the parade route! Make this spacious home your Mardi Gras headquarters!
publicDescription.transit: The home is located 2 blocks from the St. Charles Streetcar line, which can take you through the Garden District and into Uptown, or down into Downtown and the French Quarter. It costs $1.25 for 1 ride, $3 for a day pass, and $9 for a 3 day pass. You're only 5 minutes away from the Superdome, 5 minutes away from the French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, 5 minutes away from the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and 10 minutes away from City Park to attend the Voodoo Festival!We alway recommend using Uber and Lyft while getting around the city at night time.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidentally leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please clean up after your pet and dispose of any pet waste in the appropriate bins outside

9. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

As promised here are the instructions for a smooth check-in. 

 instructions/access: 415 N. Dupre St. New Orleans LA 70119

Keyless entry  door access key code -- Press 6123 and then the check button. (wait to hear it unlock)
When leaving the property simply press the check button 

Alarm code -- 6123  is the same code as the door code. Press 6123 to disarm upon entry. When you leave press "arm" then "away". When locking up at night to stay press "arm" then "stay". 

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network  Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860 24 hours a day whom handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black.  You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3 
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen

Games and books - 
Corn hole game is also in the outdoor kitchen closet 

Outdoor Kitchen -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside on counter 
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening

****IMPORTANT - Strict city regulations limit permitted use of short-term rentals. Parties are not permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. Keep all noise inside (to a minimum) or at other establishments.


Laundry -
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Brooms and cleaning supplies
Detergent 
Fire Extinguisher

publicDescription.neighborhood:
Mid-City is Quirky, unpretentious and funky
It is Known Canal Street Streetcar, Stately Canal Street homes, Charming bungalows, Eclectic restaurants and bars

 Take the red streetcar line up Canal to the Cemeteries (Mid-City‚Äôs dead neighbors are as interesting as the live ones) or bike the new 2.6-mile-long Lafitte Greenway that stretches from Basin Street to Carrollton Avenue and, conveniently, past a po‚Äô boy shop or two ‚Äì or 17 ‚Äì with a sno-ball shop and a micro-brewery thrown in for good measure. Buttermilk biscuits. Live music. Walking distance to Bayou Beer Garden and Parkway Tavern.
publicDescription.transit:
Take the Canal Streetcar Line downtown or to City Park Ave. 
Uber/Lyft is just a 5-10 min drive to the French Quarter & downtown CBD and Convention Center. 
Walk along the Laffitte Greenway and Bayou Saint John.
We recommend taking Uber or Lyft to get around at night.
publicDescription.space:
The house offers 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. 
1 KIng Bed in Master Bedroom Upstairs 
1 Queen bed in downstairs bedroom, 2 in an upstairs room 
1 Full bed in a room upstairs and 2 fulls in another upstairs 
1 Full size mattress bunk bed located in a room upstairs 
1 Pull out sofa downstairs 
1 Twin air mattress in a closet 

2,200 square feet

Great outdoor entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleeps Large  groups. 
The common spaces are thoughtfully designed for groups to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with an island/breakfast bar, and dining table. 
In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there as well as a gas grill, tv, bar and area to entertain. 

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, ironing board and steamer/iron combo, Smart TV, wifi and central AC.

We have 2 smart tvs (in living room and outdoor kitchen) loaded with Hulu Plus Live TV and a HDMI Antenna

We also have a driveway that can easily fit 2 cars. We don't recommend you blocking the sidewalk as they will ticket you for that. Also, park the right way on specific sides because they are out in full force in ticketing people.

5-10 minute Uber/Lyft ride to everything! 2 blocks to Canal Street. 1 block from the Lafitte Greenway, which is the new bike path that goes from Mid City all the way to the French Quarter!

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances. These are non-audio recording for your safety.

We have a brand new Pack-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 
We also have have games for all ages! Have your Mardi Gras party here on Endymion night! This home is close to the parade route of one of the Super Krewes parade the Saturday night before Mardi Gras Day! This is PRIME location! 

19STR-25496

This home is pet friendly! We require a non-refundable $250 pet fee. This covers cleaning such as pet hair. This fee does not include damages such as, but not limited to, chewed up furniture, urine stains, or excessive waste removal in the yard. These issues may result in additional charges. Please let us know if you will be bringing a furry friend. Failure to do so may result in extra charges. 

Large 5BR/3BA tucked in between Mid-City, Bayou Saint John and the Lafitte Greenway. Close to the red streetcar line to City Park Ave and the French Quarter.  Walking distance to the famous Parkway Tavern and Bayou Beer Garden. Close to the fairgrounds for Jazz Festival and City Park for Voodoo Festival. Perfect for large groups traveling to the city for a local experience. Great Outdoor Entertainment area for family and friends.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

424 S. Lopez access info/instructions:

Press 9505 to unlock
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the lock button. You have to make sure it is closed all the way prior to unlocking & locking with keypad. 

Alarm code - 9505

Side Gate Code: c9506x

WiFi - 
network 424 Lopez 
password - lopez424

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday.  The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3 
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening


Games and books  
 

Outdoor Kitchen -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt. All string lots are battery operated & come on & off by pressing the on/off button. Extra batteries are in the Kitchen drawer. 

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside on counter 

****IMPORTANT - all outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm. We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. 


Laundry -
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Brooms and cleaning supplies
Detergent

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:

This newly converted warehouse turned rental property is the perfect place to host your stay in New Orleans! To give the home a bit of flair, it is musically themed, with each bedroom being decorated like a different genre of music.
publicDescription.space:
4 Bedrooms 
Disco Room - 2 sets of twin over twin bunks 
Country Room - Queen Bed 
Rock'n'Roll Room - Queen Bed 
Jazz Room, Master - King Bed 
Living Space - 1 Sofa Sleeper

1,976 square feet! 

Great outdoor space for entertaining with family and friends!

Other features include laundry room complete with washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, ironing board and steamer/iron combo. We also have a Smart TV, wifi and central AC!

We have a Smart TV loaded with Hulu Plus Live TV

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances. These are non-audio recording for your privacy.

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.neighborhood: Located in the heart of Mid-City, this space is right where you want to stay for your New Orleans vacation! 4 blocks from the Canal Blv. Streetcar Line, 10 minutes from the French Quarter and the Superdome, and minutes from some of the cities best eats! We recommend Pizza Dominica, Katies Restaurant & Bar, & Willie Mae's, just to name a few!
publicDescription.transit: You're 4 blocks from the Canal Streetcar line, which will take you right into downtown. It's $1.25 per ride, $3 for a 1 day Jazzy Pass, and $9 for a 3 day Jazzy Pass. We always recommend using Uber and Lyft to get around the city at night.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

House Rules: 
1. Must provide Airbnb with identification.
2. Must be over 21 with valid identification to book
3. Occupancy restrictions. No more than 2 guests per bedroom size. (Max 10)
4. No house parties.
5. No loud noise or disruption to neighbors.
6. Quiet hours 10pm-8am
7. No smoking
8. No drugs
9. No underage drinking
10. No illegal weapons
* Any violations against rules could result in immediate cancellation and removal from property along with the right to collect violations fines from the city, extra cleaning fees, and any damage claims to credit card on file.*
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We give you your space, but we're always here if you need us!
publicDescription.access: In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor area is the perfect place to relax after a long day out in New Orleans on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there to entertain your guests.

publicDescription.summary:
A new construction 3BR/3BA beauty with cathedral ceilings stands tall and stern in the heart of the city with views of downtown in the distance from the balcony.  Inviting natural light pours into this grand fortress like castle fit for a King.  Stylish colorful decor with royal blues & emerald greens give it that fun New Orleans flair.  Located in the revitalized Central CIty neighborhood this property is close to Saint Charles Ave, downtown and the convention center. An ideal spot to catch uptown parades for Mardi Gras! This property is managed by  professional vacation rental Super Hosts. 

Redamo is a New Orleans vacation rental management company that provides authentic local experiences with the best customer service in the industry. Redamo means to love back. We love connecting generations & communities with cultural heritage & hospitality. New Orleanians embrace the term ‚ÄúSouthern Hospitality.‚Äù New Orleans is a tourist/hospitality-based economy, which is rich in southern culture; from the food, the history, the architecture, and most importantly, the people.

We look forward to hosting y'all! 

With Love,
Redamo

publicDescription.neighborhood:
This transformed revitalized and vibrant Central City & Warehouse Arts District is central to everywhere! The Central Business District to the east,  and the Garden District to the south. Walk to the streetcar line and the Convention Center. This neighborhood is rich in culture, history, music and is often overlooked.  Once home to legends Buddy Bolden, Kid Ory, and Professor Longhair.

Things to do in Central City: 
Tour the upper Garden district and take a trip to Audubon park on the Saint Charles Streetcar. 
Visit the Southern Food & Beverage Museum
Roulaison Distilling Company
Elms Mansion
Christ Church Cathedral
McKenna Museum of African American Art
The Professor Longhair Museum
The  Ponchartrain Hotel and Rooftop Bar

publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

Ask about our welcome baskets selections & luxury robes. 
Ask about local recommendations.
Contact Ashton at http://jetsetbach.com/ for all your party planning. 
Ask about our other SuperHost listings.

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

2312 Conti access info/instructions:

Press 8865 to unlock
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the üîêbutton

Alarm code - 8865

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solutions Inc. under the network  Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solutions Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860. They are available 24 hours a day to help with your wifi troubles. *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday.  The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 


You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 


Fire extinguishers- there are 3
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry
- outdoor kitchen
Please make sure if using the fire pit or grill to make sure the fire is out and grill is OFF prior to completing the evening


Games and books - in the media cabinet
Outdoor bocce is under the sink or in the closet (depending on where Housekeeper puts it) outside in the kitchen in a black zippered bag
Corn Hole is also in the outdoor kitchen closet in a black zippered bag

Outdoor Kitchen -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ash tray are outside on counter

****Please make sure if using the fire pit or grill to make sure the fire is out and grill is OFF prior to completing the evening

****IMPORTANT - all outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm. We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. Keep all noise inside (to a minimum) or at other establishments.

Laundry -
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Broom
Detergent

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

confirmedBeforeCheckIn.message:
Hello, 
We are currently handling all COVID-19 related trip issues from March 14th -April 16th. We are a small business that has been forced to work at minimal operating levels. Due to the recent overload of guest messages, and phone calls our response time will be delayed. We are giving our staff members a day to catch up and tend to their families. We will be right back with you to answer any questions you may have regarding your future trip with us.

privateDescription.houseManual:
ENJOY yourselves in our beautiful home and have a great time in New Orleans! Thank you for giving us this opportunity to show you NOLA hospitality!
Please let us know if there is anything you need or would like suggestions for restaurants, activities/events to attend or places to watch the parades if you're here for any carnival.

Front door keypad - you will receive your code 3 DAYS PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL DATE. The alarm code is the same as the front door key code.

Kitchen - the kitchen is yours to use! We have tea and coffee pods, creamer and sweetener packets. 

There are pots, pans, baking ware, blenders, glasses, you name it. Enjoy yourselves. Please be sure to clean whatever it is that you use. When using the dishwasher, please rinse and use the scrubby before placing in the dishwasher. 
Fire extinguisher in the cabinet underneath the sink.

Bathrooms -
Shampoo/Conditioner and soap are there for your use
There are blow dryers in all bathrooms.
All towels are in the cabinet as well
Ladies - please be mindful and take off your makeup prior to bed so we don't run into makeup stains all over the sheets. There is makeup remover and cotton pads and balls for your use in the bathroom. Also provided are gray wash cloths; please use these when you wipe your face and don't use the white ones.

Laundry Room -
Detergent, scent boosters and dryer sheets are in there in case you need to wash something. 
The iron/steamer combo and ironing board are in there as well.
First aid kit and fire extinguisher are on the shelf above the W/D

Bedrooms -
There are extra pillows and blankets in the closets as well as luggage racks. 

Outdoor Patio/Kitchen -
Please be careful when operating the grill. 
The grill utensils are in the kitchen in the bottom cabinet of the island. There are outdoor wine glasses, regular drinking glasses and dinnerware available as well. Please use the outdoor melamine dinnerware and glasses.

It will probably be loud especially during Mardi Gras but still please be respectful of your neighbors and keep the noise down after 10pm.

Please let us know if there is anything you need!

Property Rules:
 1.Home occupancy: This home should not exceed 14 overnight guests in 1 night. Failure                              to obey these requests will be subject to forfeiting your security deposit, plus cost of additional guest fees.

2. Check in 4pm/Check out 10am. Early check ins may be approved 1-3 days before check-in. Late check outs must be pre-approved min 1 day before checkout. 

3. Pet rule: No pets allowed. Must get approval from owner.

4. Smoking: Smoking is NOT allowed inside of this home. Please smoke on the front porch, front balcony or back patio and properly discard your cigarette/cigar buds and ashes.

5. Trash: Put large debris in outside large trash cans in front of home.

6. Illegal Drugs: Drugs are NOT allowed; Failure to comply will result in forfeiting your security deposit and being escorted off the property immediately. 

7.Dirty Laundry: Please put dirty laundry in the hamper in the laundry room. 

8. Partying/Noise: No "Partying," playing music and large gatherings in common areas such as the outdoor kitchen and front porch are not permitted at any time. Between the hours of 10pm-6am are considered "quiet time." While we want you to enjoy yourself here in New Orleans, please be respectful of your neighbors that surround you. 

9. Property Damage: Report property damage immediately so we can address the issue in a timely manner.

10. Parking: Gated driveway that will fit 1 vehicle (with gate closed) and 2 vehicles (gate open). Do not block sidewalk. They will ticket you.

11. No tape on the walls. 

12. Clean lint from dryers.

13. No shoes son the furniture.

14. Please do not put abrasive food materials down the disposal

15. Ladies ‚Äì please remove makeup & mascara before using wash cloths

16 .Do not wash cast iron grill in dishwasher or with any abrasive material or chemical

17. No abrasive material down the sinks or disposal.

18. No flushable wipes or feminine products down the toilets.

publicDescription.space:
The Space -

The house offers 5 bedrooms with a total of 10 beds (downstairs with a queen bed, upstairs with a queen bed, upstairs with a queen bed, upstairs with a twin over full bunk with twin trundle, upstairs with a queen bed) with a queen size sofa bed and 1 queen and 1 twin air bed.  All beds have high quality linens and extra blankets and pillows available in the closets.

2,300 square feet! 

Great outdoor entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleep  groups. 

The common spaces are thoughtfully designed for groups to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with an island/breakfast bar, 6 seat dining table and plenty of seating in the living room.

In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there as well with a fire pit, gas grill, tv, bar and area to entertain. 

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, scent boosters, ironing board and steamer/iron combo, Smart TV, wifi and central AC.

We have 2 smart tvs (in living room and outdoor kitchen) loaded with Hulu Plus Live TV and a HDMI Antenna

We also have a driveway to fit at least one car, maybe 2 depending on the size and plenty of on street parking. We don't recommend you blocking the sidewalk as they will ticket you for that. Also, park the right way on specific sides because they are out in full force in ticketing people.

5-10 minute Uber/Lyft ride to everything! 2 blocks to Canal Street. 1 block from the Lafitte Greenway, which is the new bike path that goes from Mid City all the way to the French Quarter!

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances. These are non-audio recording for your safety.

We have a brand new Pac-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 
We also have have games for all ages! Please let us know if you will need theses items for your trip so we can have things set up for you.Have your Mardi Gras party here on Endymion night! This home is 3 blocks from the parade route of one of the Super Krewes parade the Saturday night before Mardi Gras Day! This is PRIME location! 

You're only 5 minutes away from the Superdome, 5 minutes away from the French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, 5 minutes away from the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and 10 minutes away from City Park to attend the Voodoo Festival!


**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

5BR/3BA New construction town home in the heart of Mid City. 1 block from the Lafitte Greenway and 3 blocks to Canal Street and the Streetcar!  Lots of great restaurants and nearby attractions within a 3-5 minute Uber/Lyft ride.  Outdoor entertainment area with grill and lots of seating to hang out with your friends and family!


OFF STREET PARKING!

We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

This transformed vibrant multi-unit development in the revitalized Central City & Warehouse Arts District is central to everywhere! The Central Business District to the east,  and the Garden District to the south. Walk to the streetcar line and the Convention Center. This neighborhood is rich in culture, history, music and is often overlooked. Sleek modern design with all the amenities, and concierge services. Once home to legends Buddy Bolden, Kid Ory, and Professor Longhair.

Redamo is a New Orleans vacation rental management company that provides authentic local experiences with the best customer service in the industry. Redamo means to love back. We love connecting generations & communities with cultural heritage & hospitality. 

New Orleanians embrace the term ‚ÄúSouthern Hospitality.‚Äù New Orleans is a tourist/hospitality-based economy, which is rich in southern culture; from the food, the history, the architecture, and most importantly, the people.

publicDescription.neighborhood: Once called the Tchoupitoulas Coastal.
publicDescription.transit: The apartment is located 1 block from the St. Charles Streetcar line, which can take you through the Garden District and into Uptown, or down into Downtown and the French Quarter. It costs $1.25 for 1 ride, $3 for a day pass, and $9 for a 3 day pass. We alway recommend using Uber and Lyft while getting around the city at night time.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

Ask about our welcome baskets selections & luxury robes. 
Ask about local recommendations.
Contact Ashton at http://jetsetbach.com/ for all your party planning. 
Ask about our other SuperHost listings.

confirmedBeforeCheckIn.message:
Hello, 
We are currently handling all COVID-19 related trip issues from March 14th -April 16th. We are a small business that has been forced to work at minimal operating levels. Due to the recent overload of guest messages, and phone calls our response time will be delayed. We are giving our staff members a day to catch up and tend to their families. We will be right back with you to answer any questions you may have regarding your future trip with us.

results.title: The Beignet | (#105) by Stay Redamo üå∏

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

As promised here are the instructions for a smooth check-in. 

 Instructions/access: 

1132 Carondelet St.  Unit #105
New Orleans 70130
Parking spot #4 available 
Front gate #54321
Lockbox Code: 0105 

You will enter through the front entrance gate to the left side of the building. The keyless front gate code is #54321

The Lockbox is on the stairwell labeled 105. The code is 0105 and inside you will find keys. Please do not lose keys! We recommend leaving them in the lockbox when you leave so they don't get lost while you're out exploring. Lost keys may result in extra charges. 

Please do not lock the deadbolt on the front door. In the case of an emergency and it is locked, we have an emergency combo lock at the bottom of the stairwell with a hidden key. The combo code is 9505.

Wifi Network: caronhome
Wifi Password : 1132home
 
Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

The trash may be brought out to the red river parish dumpster.  Trash pick-up day is Thursday.
You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

There is a fire extinguisher underneath the kitchen sink. 

Bedrooms-
We have extra sheets & pillows in the closet. 


Bathrooms-
In the bathroom you will find the emergency kit, flashlight, vanity mirror, eye make-up remover, and cotton balls etc, 

Kitchen-
You will find a kettle, and keurig with coffee and tea pods. We have sweetners available and creamers in the fridge. 

The kitchen is fully stocked with all cooking utensils, plates, cups, and bakeware. We have a mini blender, shaker, and wine opener in the cabinets. 

There is laundry detergent and extra trash bags underneath the kitchen sink. 

We hope you all have a great time in New Orleans!

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

results.title: The Big Easy | by Stay Redamo üå∏

publicDescription.summary: Located just 1 block off St. Charles Ave, this new construction 5 bedroom/5 bathroom home is the perfect spot for your New Orleans vacation! *AVAILABLE FOR RESERVATIONS FEBRUARY 1, 2021*
publicDescription.space:
5 Bedrooms
5 Bathrooms 

Living area with sofa sleeper 

Great rooftop outdoor space for entertaining with family and friends!

Other features include laundry room complete with washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, ironing board and steamer/iron combo. We also have a Smart TV, wifi and central AC!

2,500 square feet!

We have a Smart TV loaded with Hulu Plus Live TV

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances. These are non-audio recording for your privacy.

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: Coded lock entry for a contactless checkin. You will have the place all to yourself!
publicDescription.neighborhood: The home is located 1 block off St. Charles Ave, in the Lower Garden District!
publicDescription.transit: You're 1 block from the St. Charles Ave Streetcar line, which will take you right into downtown or the opposite way through the Garden District into Uptown. It's $1.25 per ride, $3 for a 1 day Jazzy Pass, and $9 for a 3 day Jazzy Pass. We always recommend using Uber and Lyft to get around the city at night.
publicDescription.notes: If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We give you your space, but we're always here if you need us!

2300 Bienville access info/departure instructions:
5BR/3.5BA

Main house -
Press 7815 to unlock 
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the üîêbutton

Alarm code - 7815 

Guest Suite -
Located around the corner at 223 N. Miro (the front door faces the side street of the main house)
Press 7815 to unlock 
To lock door when you leave, simply press the lock üîê button

Alarm code - 7815

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solutions Inc. under the network  Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solutions Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860 24 hours a day whom handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*


Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black.  You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 


You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 
 

Fire extinguishers- there are 2
- guest suite 
- in laundry 


Games and books - underneath coffee table in living room


Outdoor Entertainment space -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and ash tray are outside  

****IMPORTANT - all outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm. We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. Keep all noise inside (to a minimum) or at other establishments.



Laundry -
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board 
Brooms and cleaning supplies
Detergent 
Fabric softener

publicDescription.space:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! This listing includes our 4BR/2.5BA and 1 BR/1BA guest suite. These 2 are connected via bricked entertainment patio.
Beautiful new furnishings, modern decor, open spaces and everything you could possibly need for your trip to NOLA! With exposed fireplaces and vintage mantles, you will fall in love with the home and the location!

2 blocks to the Canal Street Streetcar line, 3 blocks to the Lafitte Greenway - goes all the way to the French Quarter/Frenchmen Street and 5-8 minutes to the Superdome, CBD and Garden District. 10 minutes away from City Park where the Voodoo Festival is held and 5-8 minutes away to the Fairgrounds for the Jazz Fest! Inquire about  furnished long term Corporate rental opportunities.  

This home has 1 king in the master with a fainting couch for a twin sleeper, 2 queen beds in respective rooms, 1 queen in the guest suite, 2 twin air beds in the common area, 4 twin beds in the loft and 1 queen sofa bed in the common area. 

We will also have a brick paved patio with grill, dining table, outdoor games, and ambient  lighting -- the perfect place to relax after a long day out in NOLA!

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, scent boosters, ironing board, and steamer/iron combo), SmartTV, wifi and central AC.

2,300 square feet 

5-10 minutes Uber/Lyft ride to everthing! 2 blocks to Canal Street. 3 blocks from the Lafitte Greenway, which is the new bike path that goes from Mid City all the way to the French Quarter!

Have your Mardi Gras party here on Endymion night! This home is 2 blocks from the parade route of one of the Super Krewes parade the Saturday night before Mardi Gras Day! This is PRIME location! You're only 5 minutes away from the Superdome, 5 minutes away from the French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, 5 minutes away from the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and 10 minutes away from City Park to attend the Voodoo Festival!

We have other homes in the area but on a different account if you're interested in checking those out in case you‚Äôre looking for large groups. Please visit these links. 

https://abnb.me/EVmg/og1p7F6f3H

https://abnb.me/EVmg/rTyeFO8f3H

https://abnb.me/EVmg/YwZtNbag3H


Check in time is after 4:00pm and check out is at 10am. We are flexible on both times - it just depends on if we have people checking in/out but you are definitely more than welcome to leave your bags for a day out in NOLA while the housekeeper cleans. We will communicate 3 days prior about check in/out times since we'll have a better idea of other reservations.

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: You have access of the entire home, including the back patio with dining table, an outdoor propane grill.
publicDescription.neighborhood:
Located in Mid City, referred to as the "heart of New Orleans," our home is close to everything! The new Medical Center is within walking distance...you can see the hospital from the house.
Canal Street, which is home to the Canal Street Streetcar is 2 blocks away - also, the home to the route of the well known parade, the Krewe of Endymion. The Mid City neighborhood offers a central location and a vibrant local culture. In addition to being within striking distance to the Quarter and Uptown/Garden District, it is one of New Orleans' largest intact historic districts. The neighborhood is full of traditional roots while intermingled with modern architecture.
Our home is about 10 minutes away from the Voodoo Fest at City Park and the Jazz Fest at the Fairgrounds!
We highly recommend you rent bikes and checking out the Lafitte Greenway as well!
publicDescription.transit:
We recommend you rent bikes and ride around the city or ride on the Lafitte Greenway to the French Quarter. We've done this exact thing and you get a better perspective of Nola and the local culture by riding through the neighborhoods.
At nighttime, we don't recommend you walking anywhere in (URL HIDDEN) probably best to just use Uber/Lyft for a cheap $5 ride.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We're here is you need us but we leave you alone to have fun in NOLA!

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**
