customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

1417 Esplanade Ave access info/instructions:

Press 2865 to unlock 
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the üîêbutton

Alarm code - 2865

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solutions Inc. under the network Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please  let us know contact and Solutions Inc directly at 1-800-420-0077 24 hours a day whom handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

This house is street parking only and the house in the back has the reserved parking. If no one is checking into the back house or the parking spot is not needed we allow the front house to use the parking space, however please be mindful of how close you pull up to the access gate for the guests to enter with their luggage. 


Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

The AC temp controls are locked and set to not go below 68 or above 75, as to not risk it breaking during your stay. Tampering with the system may result in a fine. 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3 
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening


Games and books - in the wet bar area cabinets  
Corn Hole and life size Jenga are outside for your enjoyment 

Outdoor Space -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt.

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside for your use

Laundry -
Fire extinguisher 
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Broom 
Detergent 


**Please be aware that the side gate entrance leading into the shared courtyard are for those guests staying in the house located at the back of the property. Please do not somehow lock the gate from the inside, as they will not be able to access their house. You will be able to access the courtyard by exiting the back door straight into the courtyard**

DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

This Beautiful Grand Villa stands tall in a historic New Orleans neighborhood with many 19th century mansions still line the quiet &  scenic street. It is a hidden treasure running through the heart of the city. Only five-minute drive to FQ, Frenchmen St, Superdome, City Park & Fairgrounds. The stately home is 1 of 2 houses on the property. Separate private entrance w/ SHARED courtyard.

Redamo is a New Orleans vacation rental management company that provides authentic local experiences with the best customer service in the industry. Redamo means to love back. We love connecting generations & communities with cultural heritage & hospitality. New Orleanians embrace the term "Southern Hospitality." New Orleans is a tourist/hospitality-based economy, which is rich in southern culture, from the food, the history, the architecture, and, most importantly, the people.

* If you are a first responder in need of housing, please message us to inquire about Redamo's first responder home selections and our partnership with Airbnb to host those at the frontlines of COVID-19. Redamo wants to help give back to the first responder community, but there are mandated requirements we must follow to protect the health & safety of all our guests. We recently raised our cleaning fees to ensure the highest standards for public health safety. For extended stay reservations booked up until May 1st, there will be temporary guest count restrictions to reduce the spread of COVID-19.

Our beautiful city, with its vibrant social culture and rich history, is working hard to stop this virus in its tracks. We are social distancing and closing restaurants and bars in complete compliance with the CDC to kick this thing out by May 1st, 2020. As a small, family-owned company, we know we will come through this as a city, culture, and state. We have been through devastation before, and it has only strengthened us.

We look forward to hosting y'all! 

With Love,
Redamo
publicDescription.access: Guests have full access to their rental house.
publicDescription.space:
An Entire 4BR/3.5BA home to yourselves! Great outdoor SHARED entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleep large groups. 

The house offers 4  bedrooms with a total of 10 beds. 
Bedroom 1 - Queen Bed. (Downstairs)
 Bedroom 2 -King bed (upstairs master)
 Bedroom 3 - Queen bed (upstairs)
Bedroom -4 Full size Beds (2) (upstairs)
Bed 5- Large spacious landing with a - twin over full bunk with twin trundle (upstairs)

In addition, we have 3 queen air beds and 1 twin air bed for use. 

All beds have high quality linens and extra blankets and pillows available in the closets.

The common spaces are thoughtfully designed to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with an island/breakfast bar, wet bar, large dining table and plenty of seating in the living room.

In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there with a gas grill, and area to entertain.

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, scent boosters, ironing board and steamer/iron combo, Roku Tv, Hulu, wifi and central AC.

There is street parking available in front of the house for our guests. 

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.

We have a brand new Pack-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. We also have games for all ages! 

Please let us know if you will need these items for your trip so we can have things set up for you.

**In addition, we have a separate Villa on the property that you are able to rent. The Villa is 3 BD/ 2 BATHS, will sleep 6 people. The outdoor space is shared with this unit. 
Link: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/25865762?s=51

2,500 square feet

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.neighborhood: Many 19th century mansions still line the street that once functioned as a "millionaire's row" for the Louisiana Creole section of the city, similar to that of St. Charles Avenue in Uptown New Orleans.
publicDescription.transit: Walk to French Quarter or take a $5-20 Uber & Lyft ride to anywhere in the city.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are available if you need us.

We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

Our early 1900s home located off the Lafitte Greenway is just 1 mile from the French Quarter! We are 3 blocks from Canal Street, the new medical center, and streetcar line. Lots of space to spread out in this colorful and newly renovated home.


18STR-01169
publicDescription.space:
Our home includes a great outdoor space, 2 common areas (living room and den/common area), dining room, 3 bathrooms and 5 bedrooms. There is plenty of space to comfortably entertain and sleep large groups with 5 queen beds, 1 set of twin over full bunk beds with a full size trundle bed, 1 queen sofa bed and 1 queen air bed. All beds have high quality linens and extra blankets and pillows available in the closets. 

2,100 square feet 
The common spaces are thoughtfully designed for large groups to come together. We have a nice, open kitchen and common area for groups to come home and spend time together and a 6 seat dining table and a sleeper sofa in the living room and a queen air bed that is available in the den. 

Fully stocked Kitchen with all cooking supplies, and a Keurig for coffee & tea. 

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, dryer sheets, scent boosters, ironing board and steamer/iron combo), hangers, SmartTV, Wifi and central AC.

We have a pack-n-play, baby bathtub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. We also have games for all ages! 

A Smart TV is in the Living Room, den and outdoor party deck. Hulu Live + provided for streaming shows, movies, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna for streaming local channels.

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.


**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor deck is the perfect place to relax after a long day out in New Orleans. There is plenty as well with a gas grill and TV.
publicDescription.neighborhood: Have your Mardi Gras gathering here on Endymion night! This home is 3 blocks from the parade route of one of the Super Krewes parade the Saturday night before Mardi Gras Day! This is a PRIME LOCATION!
publicDescription.transit:
Getting Around -

Mid City offers plenty to do and see on foot, but there is no shortage of options available to those looking to explore the rest of the city. You always have Uber and Lyft but we are located just 3 short blocks from the Canal St. Streetcar line, where you can make going to the the CBD, French Quarter and Uptown extremely easy and quick. We think the Lafitte Greenway is the way to go! We've ridden our own bikes around there and to the FQ! 

You're only 5 minutes away from the Super Dome, 5 minutes away from the French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, 5 minutes away from the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and 10 minutes away from City Park to attend the Voodoo Festival!
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We try to let you enjoy your time but are always here to answer any questions or assist you in any way needed.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  
Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  
Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request. Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  
Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

1419 Esplanade Ave access info/instructions:

You will enter to the right of the big house (1417 Esplanade Ave) through the driveway towards the wooden gate. The keyless gate code is C9506. From there you will walk down the path to the courtyard and see the back home - 1419 Esplanade Ave

Press 1696 to unlock 
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the üîêbutton

Alarm code - 1696

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network Stay Redamo-Guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860 24 hours a day and they will handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*


Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black.  You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen

Breaker box is located at front of house. Combo is "moon" and the panel is labeled "1419"

Games and books - in the closet and on the shelf under the tv in the living room.  
Corn Hole and life size Jenga are also outside 

Outdoor Space -
Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside for your use. Please be mindful of your neighbors & loud noise after 10pm.
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening

Laundry -
Fire extinguisher 
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Broom & mop 
Detergent 

Kitchen - 
Cleaning spray is located under the sink

3BR/2BA new construction home in a beautiful Historic New Orleans neighborhood! ONLY 3 BLOCKS FROM FRENCH QUARTER!! Our property is centrally located offering endless entertainment for all ages & some of the most famous cuisine. This property is truly a New Orleans gem w/ everything you're looking to experience right around the corner. 5 min drive to FQ, Frenchmen, Superdome, City Park & Fairgrounds. The home is 1 of 2 houses on the property. Separate private entrance w/ SHARED courtyard space.
publicDescription.access: Guests have full access to the home but will have shared access to the courtyard that is in between both homes. The courtyard has a gas grill and plenty of space to entertain guests and play corn hole!
publicDescription.space:
1,800 square feet 

Entire home to yourselves! Great outdoor SHARED entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleep large groups. 

The home is one of two houses on the same property & is situated in the back with its own private/separate entrance.

The house offers 3 bedrooms with a total of 3 REGULAR BEDS AND 3 AIR BEDS. One queen bed in the downstairs bedroom and queen beds in both upstairs bedrooms. We have 2 queen air beds that can be placed in upstairs bedrooms and 1 twin air bed for downstairs, as well as a futon in living room. *** Again, a total of 3 regular beds in the bedrooms and 3 air beds***
The common spaces are thoughtfully designed to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with a 6 person dining table and plenty of seating in the living room.

In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there with a gas grill, and outdoor furniture to entertain. 

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, ironing board and steamer/iron combo,  Roku TV, Hulu, wifi and central AC.

We also have a driveway to fit at least one car, maybe 2 depending on the size and plenty of on street parking. We don't recommend you blocking the sidewalk as they will ticket you for that. Also, park the right away on specific sides because they are out in full force in ticketing people.

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.

We have a brand new Pack-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. We also have games for all ages! 

19STR-19408

**In addition, we have a separate Villa on the property that you are able to rent. The Villa is 5BR/3.5 BA, will sleep 10 people. The outdoor space is shared with this unit. 
Link: https://www.airbnb.com

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.transit: 3 BLOCKS FROM FRENCH QUARTER!! Our property is centrally located offering endless entertainment for all ages & some of the most famous cuisine. This property is truly a New Orleans gem w/ everything you're looking to experience right around the corner. 5 min drive to FQ, Frenchmen, Superdome, City Park & Fairgrounds. We always recommend using Uber and Lyft while getting around New Orleans at night.
publicDescription.neighborhood: Just blocks from the Quarter and Frenchmen Street on beautiful Esplanade Avenue! Local neighborhood cafe, Lil' Dizzy's is located across the street...our guests love this place for breakfast!
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We try to give you your space and privacy but are always here if you need us for anything!
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

HOUSE RULES :

1. Must provide Airbnb with identification.
2. Must be over 21 with valid identification to book
3. Occupancy restrictions. No more than 2 guests per bedroom size. (Max 10)
4. No house parties.
5. No loud noise or disruption to neighbors.
6. Quiet hours 10pm-8am
7. No smoking
8. No drugs
9. No underage drinking
10. No illegal weapons
* Any violations against rules could result in immediate cancellation and removal from property along with the right to collect violations fines from the city, extra cleaning fees, and any damage claims to credit card on file.*

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  

Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  

Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  

Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request.
Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  

Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

2026 Camp street access info/instructions:

The code is 5009 and then the check mark or star button.
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the check mark or star button on keypad. 

Alarm code - 5009

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network Stay Redamo-guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860. They are available 24/7 to help with your wifi troubles.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday.  The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 


Media Room - Remote is located on the charger on top of the bar in the media room. Keep the remote on the charger after using the media room. 
Pick up remote, swipe left, chose either TV which will go straight to Hulu Live + for guest login.  Choose Netflix to add  personal log in, or Apple TV to play music from your iphone with apple music. Power off. Put back on charger.

Game cabinet - 
in the media room 

Outside space ‚Äî 
Citronella candle and bug spray and ash tray outside on counter 

****IMPORTANT - all outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. Keep all noise inside, and to a minimum, or at other establishments.


Laundry‚Äî
First aid kit and fire extinguisher in laundry 
Iron/ironing board and Steamer in laundry 
Brooms and cleaning in laundry

Hello, 
We are currently handling all COVID-19 related trip issues from March 14th -April 16th. We are a small business that has been forced to work at minimal operating levels. Due to the recent overload of guest messages, and phone calls our response time will be delayed. We are giving our staff members a day to catch up and tend to their families. We will be right back with you to answer any questions you may have regarding your future trip with us.

privateDescription.houseManual:
ENJOY yourselves in our beautiful home and have a great time in New Orleans! Thank you for giving us this opportunity to show you NOLA hospitality!
Please let us know if there is anything you need or would like suggestions for restaurants, activities/events to attend or places to watch the parades if you're here for any carnival.

Front gate- reach inside and open from the inside
Front door key less entry- you will receive code 3 days before arrival. To enter, simply press the lower left corner (*) and it'll lighten up. Press your code and then the * key 

Living Room - All we ask is that you be extremely careful with any red wine or anything that can stain the white leather sofa.

Kitchen - The kitchen is yours to use! The coffee maker is just like a keurig, except you can choose how weak or how strong you would like your coffee. Just turn the dial and choose the # of ounces. We have coffee, tea, and sweetner packets. 

There are pots, pans, baking ware, crock pots, blenders, glasses, spices, you name it. Enjoy yourselves. Please be sure to clean whatever it is that you use. When using the dishwasher, please rinse and use the scrubby before placing in the dishwasher. 
Fire extinguisher in the cabinet underneath the sink.

Media Room - Remote is located on the charger on top of the bar in the media room. Keep the remote on the charger after using the media room. 
Pick up remote, swipe left, chose either TV which will go straight to Hulu Live + for guest login.  Choose Netflix to add  personal log in, or Apple TV to play music from your iphone with apple music.Power off. Put back on charger.
There are a number of fun games in the cabinet underneath the bar
Ice bucket and tongs and cocktail mixer are there for you to use. Have fun!

Stairwell - 
Please be careful on the stairwells, especially with young children. Be mindful of the chandelier.

Master Bedroom -
Extra sheets, pillows and blankets are in the cedar chest. Roku TV with Hulu live + HDMI Antenna.

Master Bathroom -
Shampoo/Conditioner and Soap are there for your use
The blow dryer is on the bottom pull out shelf/drawer in the cabinet
All towels are in the cabinet as well

Ladies - please be mindful and take off your makeup prior to bed so we don't run into makeup stains all over the sheets. There is makeup remover and cotton pads and balls for your use in the bathroom. Also provided are gray wash cloths; please use these when you wipe your face and don't use the white ones.

Laundry Room -Located on the 2nd floor. Detergent, scent boosters, dryer sheets provided as well as ironing board, and iron/steamer combo. Also including: 
	*First Aid Kit
	*Fire Extinguisher
	*Flashlight 
        *broom/dust pan
	*mop
	*step ladder



There are extra sheets and blankets in the closets as well as hampers and luggage racks in the 3 bedrooms upstairs. Hair dryers provided in the other bathrooms upstairs. For people sleeping downstairs, they can put their bags to the left of the stairs as there is plenty of space there too.

Outdoor Patio/Kitchen -
Please be careful when operating the grill. 
The grill utensils are in the kitchen in the drawer to the left of the stove.
The remote for the Roku TV outside is in the wooden box on the side table in the media room labeled "deck"
It will probably be loud especially during Mardi Gras but still please be respectful of your neighbors and keep the noise down after 10pm on the weekdays and 10pm on the weekends.

For the master bathroom - if the hot water is not ‚Äúworking,‚Äù please press the button underneath the lever and this will turn on the hot water.

Please let us know if there is anything you need!
privateDescription.directions:
There is room in the driveway for at least one car. Don't block the driveway because they will ticket you. There is also parking on the street but once you find parking, we recommend you not moving until you're ready to leave because you might not find another spot for 2-3 blocks.

We recommend you ubering/lyfting anywhere in Nola because it's hard to find parking unless you don't mind parking several blocks away. 

You can also take the St. Charles Street Streetcar. Just walk up 4 blocks to St. Charles Street and they usually come every 15-20 minutes. Download the rtagomobile app for more information or go to norta.com to see schedules and routes for your destinations.

publicDescription.houseRules:
‚Ä¢ No smoking
‚Ä¢ No pets
‚Ä¢ No parties or events
‚Ä¢ Check-in is anytime after 4PM
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

Location! Location! 1 Block off Magazine Street! 
Relax on the master bedroom balcony in the morning light at this 1860s Greek Revival historic home. 12-foot ceilings and antique hardwood floors sit alongside stunning decorative fireplaces for a grand, updated finish. Cathedral ceilings, winding staircase, transoms, home theater, and a romantic courtyard. Perfect home for the holidays and Mardi Gras celebration.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are here as much or as little as you need us!
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.
publicDescription.transit:
7 min uber/lyft ride to the French Quarter
5 min ride to CBD/warehouse district


We recommend when you're in any big city such as New Orleans, to Uber/Lyft at nighttime.
publicDescription.neighborhood: There are shops and restaurants within walking distance, including District Donuts, Juan's Flying Burrito, Maya's, Down the Hatch, and the Tasting Room all within a block. Just a few blocks to the Streetcar line.
publicDescription.access: The entire home is yours to enjoy!
publicDescription.space:
2,300 Square Feet 

This elegant & charming 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath Greek Revival home is located in the Lower Garden District. It's steps from Magazine Street and 4 blocks to St. Charles Ave. OFF STREET PARKING FOR 3! 

GRAND HOME THEATER!

Home features antique heart pine wood floors, double stacked kitchen cabinets with all the gadgets, marble and soapstone counter tops, 36" duel fuel range oven, a beautiful media room, which has theatre style seating and an 80" flat screen complete with surround sound speakers to create a personalized home movie theater.  

 There is one bedroom downstairs as well. This room has 1  twin over full bunk beds with 1 twin trundle bed. We can also put a queen air bed in the theatre room to sleep more or to provide your guests their own bed...just please let us know upon booking or at least the week before arrival. 

The second floor features the master bedroom (its own private wing), which has a king bed, private bathroom with claw foot tub and private shower with body sprays. Full sized laundry room for your convenience also on 2nd floor. We also have 2 queen and 1 twin air mattresses to fit in other bedrooms or for the common areas - it's your choice!

We also have a Pac-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 
We also have have games for all ages!

The backyard has an outdoor kitchen with plenty of seating, built in gas grill, cook top and a flat screen tv for relaxing evenings or daytime gatherings. 

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you (our guests) use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.
There is off street parking with gated access.

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.

customFields.fullText:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  

Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  

Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request.
Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  

Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

221 N. Miro access info/instructions:

Press 3695 to unlock
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the lock button.

Alarm code - 3695

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network  Stay Redamo-guests.  If for any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay, please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860. They are available 24 hours a day to help with your wifi troubles. *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday.  The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 


You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 



Fire extinguishers - there are 3
- in laundry
- underneath the sink
- outdoor kitchen

Adult & Children's Games and books - in media cabinet
Life size Jenga in front bedroom on 1st floor closet

Outdoor Entertainment space -

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

publicDescription.space:
2,000 Square Feet

The Space -

Entire home to yourselves! Great outdoor entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleep large groups. The house offers 5 bedrooms with a total of 10 beds (downstairs bedroom 1 with a queen bed, bedroom 2 with a queen bed, bedroom 3 with a queen bed, bedroom 4 with a full over full bunk with twin trundle, bedroom 5 with a king bed) with a queen size sofa bed and 1 queen and 1 twin air bed that can be set up in any room you choose with all blankets and sheets ready for you! All beds have high quality linens and extra blankets and pillows available in the closets.

The common spaces are thoughtfully designed for large groups to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with an island/breakfast bar, 6 seat dining table and plenty of seating in the living room.

In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there as well with a gas grill, tv, bar and area to hang out with your friends and family.

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, ironing board and steamer/iron combo), Roku Tv, Hulu, , wifi and central AC.

We also have a driveway to fit at least one car, maybe 2 depending on the size and plenty of on street parking. We don't recommend you blocking the sidewalk as they will ticket you for that. Also, park the right away on specific sides because they are out in full force in ticketing people.

Safety is always 1st for us so we have provided you use of the home alarm security system while you're staying at our home. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.

We have a brand new Pac-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 
We also have have games for all ages! 

Have your Mardi Gras gathering here on Endymion night! This home is 2 blocks from the parade route of one of the Super Krewes parade the Saturday night before Mardi Gras Day! This is a PRIME location!

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: Guests have full access to the entire home.
publicDescription.neighborhood: The property is close to the Canal Streetcar line which travels all the way down to the vibrant French Quarter. The Superdome, Frenchmen Street, the Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and City Park for the Voodoo Festival are all within easy reach!
publicDescription.transit:
5-7 minute Uber/Lyft ride from the French Quarter. 
2 blocks from the Lafitte Greenway, which is the new bike path that goes from Mid City all the way to the French Quarter! 1.5 blocks from the Canal Streetcar line and Medical Center!
Lots of great restaurants and nearby attractions within a 3-5 minute Uber/Lyft ride.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are here if you need us but leave you be to enjoy yourselves!
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

Mid City Gem! 5BR/3BA brand new construction home in the heart of Mid City.  Awesome outdoor entertainment area with grill and lots of seating to hang out with your friends and family!
OFF STREET PARKING!

publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

A Historic Victorian Double Gallery home with wrought iron balconies  mixed with Rustic Modern design.  Pots of ferns hang like rows of garland, a leafy-green cascade tumbling over railings. A coffee shop on the corner sends up the scent of freshly-brewed coffee and the promise of fresh-baked beignets, Up on a balcony, a pianist is sending the sweet notes of jazz into the air. Less than a mile to downtown, French Quarter, and the famous restored  Saenger Theatre. Perfect for Large groups.

Residential Mid-City centers on City Park, a vast green expanse with sports facilities, the New Orleans Botanical Garden and boating on Big Lake. Outside the park, mellow bars and breakfast spots attract a laid-back crowd.

Frey's 
Juans Flying Burrito 
Mr. Ed's 

Bars -

Bayou Wine Garden 
Wrong Iron

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  

Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  

Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request.
Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  

Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

1918 Conti: instructions/access

Access key code -- 7609


Alarm code -- 7609

gate code: C9506

Wifi -- 
You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network Stay Redamo - Guests.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860 24 hours a day whom handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday. The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black.  You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

Kitchen 
Cleaning spray is under the sink 

Games (kids & adults) - in media cabinet on right side door.
EL Jenga & Connect-Four in outdoor area 

Outdoor Space: 
Please use outdoor dinnerware and glasses for outside - plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please dont microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt. 
Citronella candle, bug spray and ash tray 
Fire extinguishers- there are 2 
- under the kitchen sink 
- outside in the grill area 

Laundry ‚Äî
First aid kit and fire extinguisher
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Broom and mop

customFields.value:
Redamo Guest Check Out Instructions 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope you enjoyed your stay and made lots of unforgettable memories! We will welcome you back to our great city anytime!    

When you‚Äôre ready to book your next vacation give us a call, or go online to www.stayredamo.com for current discounts and promotions! You‚Äôll save time and money by booking directly.  

Check-out Time is 10:00AM 

Upon departure, please don‚Äôt forget to do the following: 

1. Close & lock all windows 

2. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75/heater to 68.   

3. Strip all sheets off beds and place on floor. Housekeeping will launder them.  

4. Please start a load of dishes in the dishwasher. 

5. Please return all games to appropriate locations. 

6. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc. 

7. Please double check for all your belongings. If, by chance, you accidently leave something behind, Redamo will gladly ship your items to you for a $75 return fee.   

8. Please turn alarm on "Away" upon departure. 

***REVIEWS*** 

We love guest reviews! If there was something special about your trip, something unique about the rental property, or if someone from our team was exceptionally helpful, we‚Äôd love to hear about it!  

**Unfortunately, Nola regulations are becoming very strict and city inspectors are reading reviews, so please do not mention if you were here for a big party, bachelor/bachelorette/wedding, etc.**

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  

Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  

Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request.
Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  

Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

816 Elysian Fields  access info/instructions:

Press 1532 Checkmark to unlock
To lock the door when you leave, simply press the check button. Please note this is an original old door. You have to make sure it is closed all the way prior to unlocking & locking with keypad. 

Alarm code - 1532
Please be careful opening original shutters & the windows in the front. 

Side Gate Code: C9506 

You will be prompted to login to our commercial grade wifi connection with our service provider Solution Inc. under the network Stay Redamo-guest.  If or any reason you lose signal or have any wifi issues during your stay with us please contact Solution Inc directly at 1-844-640-5860 24 hours a day whom handle all of our accounts.  *PLEASE DO NOT UNPLUG THE MODEM FOR ANY REASON*

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  Do not log out of our Hulu account. You will be charged a fee. You may use your personal logins for other accounts like Netflix, HBO, etc. Make sure you log out of your own personal accounts. 

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Thursday.  The name of the company is River Parish and the cans are black. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Thursday from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked. 

You may change the temperature in the thermostat to meet your comfort level but it must stay in the range of 68-75 

Fire extinguishers- there are 3 
- under kitchen sink
- in laundry 
- outdoor kitchen
Please make sure the grill is OFF prior to completing the evening


Games and books - in the family room chest below Smart TV
Outdoor bocce is outside in the outdoor Kitchen. 
 

Outdoor Kitchen -
**Please use outdoor dinnerware/glasses for outside- plates, wine and regular cups that are plastic. Please don't microwave the melamine dinnerware plates as they will melt. All string lots are battery operated & come on & off by pressing the on/off button. Extra batteries are in the Kitchen drawer. 

Citronella candles, bug spray, DynaTrap, Fogger and an ashtray are outside on counter 

****IMPORTANT - all outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm. We have neighbors who are totally against short term rentals and will call the police for disturbing the peace as they all have families and work during the week. 


Laundry -
First aid kit
Iron/ironing board and Steamer
Brooms and cleaning supplies
Detergent

publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

This spacious historical home is walking distance to Frenchman Street, Washington Park, and the French Quarter.  Professional pictures coming soon! 

 With one trip around the clubs on Frenchmen, you are likely to hear all kinds of music, as it is what the street is known for. It‚Äôs not the first place most visitors know to go to, but inside the clubs like Snug Harbor, the Spotted Cat, d.b.a , Blue Nile and even outside on the street, you‚Äôll hear some of the best live music produced anywhere in the world.
publicDescription.space:
2,200 square feet 

5BR/3BA Home with gorgeous chandeliers, fully stocked kitchen, game room and grand backyard with a deck, fountain, swing, bocce ball and a lush garden. 

 It will have 1 king bed, 3 Queen beds, 2 Full beds, and a pull out couch. We will also have 1 Queen air mattress and 2 twins air mattress.

Here are a few links to the other homes we manage to give you an idea of our standards at stayRedamo. We furnish our homes with the best home designers on our team!

https://www.airbnb.com/manage-your-space/38466171/details
https://www.airbnb.com/manage-your-space/19163475/details
https://www.airbnb.com/manage-your-space/17125361/details


**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.access: Keyless entry
publicDescription.transit: Walking distance to Frenchman Street & French Quarter!
publicDescription.neighborhood:
Designated as an official Historic District, the Faubourg Marigny is filled with stunning and well-preserved historical buildings and landmarks. Originally a residential neighborhood filled with Creole cottages, the Marigny‚Äôs geographical location soon transformed the neighborhood into a small business and industrial area. In more recent years, the Marigny and Bywater has experienced another major transformation into a trendy, affordable neighborhood for residents with restaurants, music clubs, art and B&B's

Roberts Fresh Market & Starbucks across the street
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We are here if you need assistance or local recommendations,
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

publicDescription.space:
2,000 square feet 

Great outdoor entertainment space and open floor plan to comfortably entertain and sleep large groups. The house offers 5 bedrooms with a total of 9 beds 
Bedroom 1 - king bed
Bedroom 2 - queen bed
Bedroom 3 - queen bed
Bedroom 4 - 2 queen beds
Bedroom 5 - full over full bunk with twin trundle
Queen size sofa bed & 2 queen air beds that can be set up upon arrival - please let us know if you will need them! 
All beds have high quality linens. Extra blankets and pillows available in the closets. 

The common spaces are thoughtfully designed for large groups to come together. We have a large, open concept living area that features a fully-equipped kitchen with an island/breakfast bar, 6 seat dining table and plenty of seating in the living room.

Other features include laundry (washer, dryer, detergent, ironing board and steamer/iron combo, smart TV, wifi and central AC.

Hulu + Live  Guest log-in to get movies, shows, and live TV channels. HDMI antenna available to stream for local channels.  

We have a driveway to fit at least one car, possibly 2 depending on the size, plenty of free street parking. Please do not block the sidewalk if parked in the driveway.

The home has a security system for your safety. We also have several outdoor security cameras placed throughout the back, side and front entrances.

We have a brand new Pack-n-Play, baby bath tub, baby bath, highchair, children's dinnerware, utensils, sippy cups, toys and games for babies/children. 

We also have have games for all ages! 

**IMPORTANT** - Strict city regulations limit permitted uses of short term rentals. Parties are NOT permitted at the home. Please note that we have a noise policy. All outside entertainment must be finalized by 10pm.  Noise monitors and cameras are are located on the exterior of property and will alert us if noise gets to a certain level. Our quiet hours are 10pm-8am.  Must be 21 or older to rent and have a valid drivers license. If you have any questions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.
publicDescription.interactionWithGuests: We give you your space but are available if you need us for questions or recommendations!
publicDescription.summary:
DISCLAIMER: This property does not allow local residents within 60 miles radius, groups under 21 years of age, events, parties (bachelor /bachelorette groups are allowed), photo shoots or gatherings of any kind. To abide by all legal requirements and security rules, you may be asked to provide a governmentissued photo ID, confirm your contact information, provide a valid credit card with a name that matches your ID and in some instances, complete a criminal background check. [The information is collected for screening and verification only and is not stored or used for any other purposes.
	 
Please be advised that all guests will be asked to sign a rental usage agreement that governs the terms of the stay. By completing the reservation you agree to the following:
- You agree to be bound by our rental terms and conditions and liable for a fine if you exceed those bounds.
- You acknowledge that you will be required to provide a copy of a valid government-issued ID and matching credit card prior to check-in.
- You acknowledge that you may be required to undergo a background check if mandated by the property management company as stated in accordance with your rental agreement and condition of the booking.
- You understand that your check-in instructions might be withheld until you have successfully completed our verification portal.

This home is pet friendly! We require a non-refundable $250 pet fee. This covers cleaning such as pet hair. This fee does not include damages such as, but not limited to, chewed up furniture, urine stains, or excessive waste removal in the yard. These issues may result in additional charges. Please let us know if you will be bringing a furry friend. Failure to do so may result in extra charges. 

5BR/3BA new construction home in the heart of Mid City! Minutes from French Quarter, Frenchmen St, World War II Museum, Superdome, Jackson Square, & City Park! 

Spacious outdoor entertainment area with outdoor kitchen & plenty seating for friends & family to hang out.
publicDescription.houseRules:
‚Ä¢ No smoking
‚Ä¢ No pets
‚Ä¢ No parties or events
‚Ä¢ Check-in is anytime after 4PM
publicDescription.access: In addition to our indoor space, our outdoor entertainment area is perfect to relax after a long day out in New Orleans and on your feet. There is plenty of seating out there as well with a fire pit, gas grill, tv, bar and area to entertain.
publicDescription.notes:
If you see our reviews, we have the highest cleaning standards in the area. We have actually taken a step further in battling COVID-19 at no extra costs to our guests. We are sanitizing every surface with special attention paid to high touch areas like doorknobs and light switches. We have also employed a fogging machine that microscopically sprays hospital grade disinfectant in every nook and cranny of the home. And we wash every blanket, coverlet and sheet at every turn, something hotels don't even do! Which means our homes are as clean as they can possibly be! Our houses are also larger than most in the area, requiring more cleaning and a fee that reflects that. We strive to make our homes as affordable, safe and clean as we possibly can!

If the home requires excessive cleaning, additional cleaning fees will be charged.
publicDescription.neighborhood:
Mid-City centers on City Park, a vast green area with sports facilities, the New Orleans Botanical Garden and boating on Big Lake. Other park attractions include Carousel Gardens Amusement Park, with its antique wooden carousel, and the New Orleans Museum of Art, home to an eclectic global collection and a sculpture garden. Outside the park, mellow bars and breakfast spots attract a laid-back crowd.

Bars and Restaurants in the Area: 
The Wrong Iron - Outdoor/indoor bar great for football season. They usually have food trucks too! 
Trepes - Brand new restaurant 
Bayou Beer Garden / Bayou Wine Garden - Outdoor/indoor bar. The Wine Garden has a great food menu! 
Katie's - As seen on "Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives"! Amazing brunch and great New Orleans classics!
publicDescription.transit: You are 5 blocks from Canal Street & Street Car Line which will take you all the way to the French Quarter! You're only 5-10 minutes away from the Mercedes-Benz Superdome, French Quarter and Frenchmen Street, Fairgrounds for Jazz Fest and City Park to attend the Voodoo fest. We alway recommend using Uber and Lyft while getting around the city at night time.

customFields.value:
What you can expect: 
Redamo is happy to provide you with some basic amenities and small starter supplies to get you started.  
You can expect the following items in all Redamo homes:  
Fresh linens ‚Äì including bedding and towels 
Simple toiletries ‚Äì shampoo, conditioner, and hand soap 
Paper products ‚Äì starter sets of paper towels and toilet paper are provided 
Basic supplies ‚Äì coffee, tea, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, laundry detergent, and a few garbage bags are provided upon arrival.  

Here‚Äôs what you can expect to find in Standard Redamo Kitchens: 
All the expected & essential supplies you‚Äôll need to prepare meals ‚Äì dishes, silverware, utensils, and pots & pans 
There may be a small supply of spices or cooking oils that prior guests have left behind. Unfortunately, due to Louisiana Health Code Regulations, we can‚Äôt guarantee any specific pantry item will be stocked.  
Gadgets & Gear ‚Äì refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster, water glasses, coffee cups, etc.  
Interested in having groceries or food delivered right to your door?  
Uber Eats and Instacart are great resources in having groceries and meals delivered right to your door.  

Would you like to have your rental unit cleaned throughout your stay?  
Mid-stay cleanings are available upon request.
Please contact Redamo Guest Services at 504-408-0855.  

Don‚Äôt forget to tag us in your photos! #StayRedamo

The code to obtain key from lockbox downstairs is #0218. You will leave the key in that box upon checking out.
Upstairs, the code is #0712 for touchpad on door.

Our private trash pick up service is scheduled to come every Monday. You do not have to bring the trash cans out. The driver will personally come to pick them up. We just kindly ask you that you do not block the driveway access to the trash cans on Mondays from 8am-4pm. The driver will not be able to pick up the trash if it is blocked.

Upon departure, please do the following:
1. put all trash in trash carts outside which is located in the blue garbage can across the street
2. All dirty dishes in kitchen
3. Please turn up all AC thermostats to 75
4. Please return all games to appropriate locations
5. Please remove and discard all decorations and remove any tape on walls, furniture, etc

**When you walk outside, trash carts are located directly across the street. Big blue ones**

This transformed vibrant multi-unit development in the revitalized Central City & Warehouse Arts District is central to everywhere! The Central Business District to the east,  and the Garden District to the south. Walk to the streetcar line and the Convention Center. This neighborhood is rich in culture, history, music and is often overlooked. Sleek modern design with all the amenities, and concierge services. Once home to legends Buddy Bolden, Kid Ory, and Professor Longhair. Sleek modern design managed by a 5 star Property Management Company Redamo. 

StayRedamo is a New Orleans vacation rental management company that provides authentic local experiences with the best customer service in the industry. Redamo means to love back. We love connecting generations & communities with cultural heritage & hospitality. 

New Orleanians embrace the term ‚ÄúSouthern Hospitality.‚Äù New Orleans is a tourist/hospitality-based economy, which is rich in southern culture; from the food, the history, the architecture, and most importantly, the people.

This is a new Airbnb account managed by professional Super Hosts. 
We loved hosting so much we decided to do it for other homeowners.
